item.title: Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh - City of Nawabs
item.description: THERE’S SOMETHING THAT HAPPENS TO YOU WHEN YOU COME BACK TO YOUR HOMETOWN. ~JOSEPH DOUGHERTY Ah! Lucknow, the most amazing city of memories. Such a calm city with kids playing cricket at almost every corner. That’s how I grew up at least. It has changed with time too, but still holds such a beauty every time I visit. The amazing Charbagh Railway Station to iconic Aminabad. With progressive Gomti Nagar to chilled Jankipuram and from Aashiyana to Bara Imambara.
